successes.title: LANDFILL HARMONIC: Inspiring dreams one note at a time!
successes.description: A heartfelt & moving story of how instruments made from recycled trash bring hope to children whose future is otherwise spiritless.

Pledges.description: With humor, with love, with gratitude: Thank you for your support. $1 means a lot...
